name: Chickadee Aviation
about: Chickadee Aviation, a Part 61 flight training school, is dedicated to providing high-quality aviation education at all levels. Located at the Auburn-Lewiston Municipal Airport in Maine, we offer programs from private pilot training to advanced commercial and instructor certifications. Our fleet includes Cessna 172s, a Piper PA-34, and we utilize an FAA Certified Redbird FMX Flight Simulator for comprehensive ground and simulation training. Founded by Ronald Wood, who transitioned from enjoying flying as a hobby to sharing his passion with others, Chickadee Aviation also offers scenic tours and aircraft rentals. With highly skilled instructors and a commitment to excellence, we aim to make every student's aviation journey successful and enjoyable. Join us to soar to new heights in aviation.
